response.message:
It's the Whole 42 thing...

I always knew there was something wrong with the universe. ;)

Twobob, that's perfectly normal paranoia; everybody experiences that. 

(I'm paraphrasing ;)
I am curious about what's 67 number related to?

Why do all programmer startups try and create an app to link all your social relationships/friends/fun activities?
It's not exactly a natural programmer field of expertise

I tried to check your questions page today... s.tk/podcastquestions

My Bitdefender got crazy:

STOP! Bitdefender blocked this web page.
The page you are trying to access contains malware.
Details:
Web Page: http://s.tk/podcastquestions

Access from your browser has been blocked.



... otherwise your podcast is really cool!
